"I see. What r we up against here?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Quilldart nodded. "Yes Prime wa sa good leader. Galvatron beat him 
in that 
> battle, but lost his will to Unicron when that damn starscream 
betrayed him. 
> I  was created by Unicron to aid him from the shell of an barley 
living 
> spark. When he rebelled unicron's orders backfired on him and I 
helped him. 
> Though he lost his battle with Rodimus Prime due to the 
matrix...his evil was 
> never destroyed."
